resources.string: Sorry, no Amazon link found. Triple Camel will work only sharing an Amazon URL.
Sorry, no suitable app found to open an URL.

Hi! This is the information page about Triple Camel.

This app works by sharing a product from the Amazon app, and by choosing Triple Camel as the sharing app from the list.

If you run this app from the app menu, you will see this information page and nothing more will happen.
